entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
